SUBSCRIBE.HEAD: 訂閱我們的消息

SUBSCRIBE.TEXT: 每個月 1 - 2 個精華郵件

BANNER.TEXT: EGaaS是一個用於組織經濟、公共以及社會活動的區塊鏈平台。這些活動由智能法律和智能合約驅動。

MISSION.TEXT1: eGaaS 的主要使命是釋放人民、企業、政府免受傳統的官僚程序影響，並且成為一個無需繁瑣文件交互之下舉辦並控制各類型活動的工具。eGaaS旨在照亮現代金融和政治制度下的陰霾。eGaaS能夠成為所有國家與國家和業務之間融和交互的協作平台，從而令社會在順暢運作中繁榮。
MISSION.TEXT2: eGaaS將透過區塊鏈技術處理大多數類型的政府和業務活動運行所需的4個基礎功能：金融系統，註冊表結構，智能合同算法以及智能法律形成和執行機制。金融系統使用特定貨幣來進行某國的交易。智能合約能夠自動實現涉及註冊表對象和涉及法定貨幣交易的交易算法。智能法律規範智能合同的創建、實施和運行，並自動規範在政府體系內個人和組織之間的關係。

BUTTONS.TEXT1: Transferring the activities of governments and legislative bodies to the eGaaS platform can save nearly 10 % of global GDP each year.

ABOUT.TEXT1: 每個國家能夠獨立設置國家機構的內部結構，確立其治理的方針和機構公民關係的原則。eGaaS管理政府登記冊中進行確認和記錄數據的協議，提供智能法律的模板，用於支持系統的運行和實現。
ABOUT.TEXT2: 所有的地區法律，凡為eGaaS的註冊對象，都會轉化到智能法律的格式，智能法律為直接有效的法律，不需要透過任何中介或監管機構操作，對有關法律的更改能夠即時生效。政府機構的許多職能 - 例如公民身份（出生，婚姻）的註冊，稅務，金融和商業關係的監管等等 - 均可由eGaaS智能法自動執行和控制。
ABOUT.TEXT3: 在eGaaS中，我們可以可靠地識別公民，從而簡化選舉程序 - 特製的智能法律能夠界定選舉的期限和條件，接受候選人的申請，並啟動自動化的投票和點票程序。 通過電子密鑰簽署能夠進行省時、高效而且最低成本的投票活動。而且選舉結果將會被存儲在區塊鏈中，確保不能被篡改。
ABOUT.TEXT4: 如果一個地區希望加入共同區塊鏈平台，該地區的中央銀行只需要為地區的所有個人和法律實體建立eGaaS賬戶。 由此起的所有金融交易，不論是商店購買商品到執行國家預算，都將能夠在智能法律的控制下進行。 任何財務義務（償還貸款，保險支付，賬單支付等）亦能夠通過智能合約自動執行。在eGaaS協議下，地區能夠實現輕鬆可靠的p2p貸款程序。
ABOUT.TEXT5: 智能法律和智能合同在大量用戶使用eGaaS平台時就能夠高效地運行：這些用戶包括自然人和法律實體，以及其財產，版權，發明等等。毋庸置疑，區塊鏈技術將大大提高註冊管理機構的安全性，防止操縱和欺詐。
ABOUT.TEXT6: eGaaS保持每個人的所有醫療記錄，醫療建議，診斷等，同時保持數據的匿名性。因此，每個人都可以在世界任何地方在數據的流通下接受有效的治療。同時，醫學和藥理學的機構就能夠獲得獨特而全面的統計信息，令治療、診斷和處方的效率和準確性提升到前所未有的水平。
ABOUT.TEXT7: eGaaS是有效整全的業務操作工具。它包含註冊表（公司，產品，許可證等）的通用結構，能夠用於制定各式各樣的智能合約 智能法律體系則能夠自動扣除稅款，關稅和其他費用。
ABOUT.TEXT8: 記錄公民的收入和醫療數據記錄將允許政府，即智能法律，制定更全面的殘疾養卹金、津貼和福利，使這些資金能夠有效地支持社會的日常運作。 國家養老金制度也是在智慧法律的基礎上實施的，它能夠自動分配社會稅，計算養老金，並在公民達到退休年齡時開始分發。

TEAM.HEAD: 團隊

PEOPLE1.NAME: Oleg Strelenko
PEOPLE1.PROFESSION: 投資者, 首席執行官, 區塊鏈開發者
PEOPLE1.TEXT: 擁有5年的工作經驗的區塊鏈開發者。負責從基礎開發分散電子貨幣DCoin（8萬行Go代碼）。他在俄羅斯IT社區稱為Dmitry Kharitonov。十多年來，他已經開發了自己的項目和管理多個IT團隊。

PEOPLE2.NAME: Artur Pakhomov
PEOPLE2.TEXT: 聖彼得堡工商會理事會主席團成員。擁有經濟學博士學位。亦是一系列關於房地產管理現代化與重組報告和研究論文的作者。擁有30多年經驗，他已經實現了多個自己的項目，其中部分為國際項目。

PEOPLE3.NAME: Yuriy Lomakin
PEOPLE3.TEXT: 具有10年經驗的前端開發人員。 在charmerstudio.com團隊工作，開發主要新聞門戶lenta.ru。

PEOPLE4.NAME: Aleksandr Boldachev
PEOPLE4.TEXT: 俄羅斯未來學家協會的成員，是一位哲學家和分析師。主要研究領域：全球進化論，時間本體論，人工智能哲學，未來學。近年來，他致力於使用主體事件模型創建複雜系統建模方法。

PEOPLE5.NAME: Ruben Pombuhchan
PEOPLE5.TEXT: 創新技術開發和實現專家，專業投資分析師，身為Sapsan諮詢集團負責人。 他在大型企業的項目管理方面有豐富的經驗。 他曾參與大型公司和集團的主要項目，如Gazprom，Magnit和Basic Element。 他是機構項目工程實驗室（IPE Lab）項目辦公室的負責人。

PEOPLE6.NAME: Sergey Chernyshev
PEOPLE6.TEXT: Sergey是哲學家，講師以及組織管理領域的專家。 現身為國家研究大學高等經濟學院教授，並是俄羅斯政府專家委員會成員，編寫了8篇專著和150篇論文。 擔任機構項目工程實驗室（IPE Lab）研究委員會主任。

PEOPLE7.NAME: Alexey Krivonogov
PEOPLE7.TEXT: 一個有24年編程經驗專業的C / C ++ 程序員。在1992年畢業於新西伯利亞州立大學，獲得數學和應用數學學位。白手開發編程語言Gentee，並開發個人數據存儲系統Eonza。

PEOPLE8.NAME: Dmitry Eliseev
PEOPLE8.TEXT: Dmitry是技術科學，經濟學博士，作為專業管理顧問並兼任副教授。為70多個出版物和手冊的作者。15年來，在Oreltekmash等跨國公司成功實現了46個關於戰略規劃和組織設計的諮詢項目。身為高級方法學家，他於機構項目工程實驗室（IPE Lab）擔任研究委員會成員。

PEOPLE9.NAME: Andrey Nechaev
PEOPLE9.TEXT: 擁有5年以上軟件開發經驗，Andrey對後端（Erlang，Java和Python）Web Stack擁有深入的了解。曾開發前端和高負載後端應用程序。 對於流行的移動平台開發擁有豐富經驗，並能夠交叉編譯所有流行的桌面和移動平台。並專注研究容錯率高的分佈式服務與用戶體驗研究。

PEOPLE10.NAME: Nikolay V. Kapranov
PEOPLE10.TEXT: Ph.D. in technical sciences; Ph.D. in political science. More than 10 years of experience in state authorities, 4 years of experience in international organizations. 7 years as a Deputy Director in the Administration of the President of the Russian Federation, Internal Policy Department. Was an Advisor to the Academy President in the Soviet Academy of Science, governed his own research institute. Has a number of state awards.

PEOPLE11.NAME: Nosova Anna
PEOPLE11.TEXT: Psychologist. 4 years of experience in the field of project promotion. 2 years of experience in the organization and management of social projects. Cooperated with international environmental and volunteer organizations: Peace Corp, Spare, Biomass Project, United Nations Development Programme. Is the author of the educational program and a number of scientific articles.

PEOPLE12.NAME: Vitaly Bondar
PEOPLE12.TEXT: Vitaly is a Russian qualified lawyer and Legal Director of the Luxembourg based law firm ChristmannSchmitt. He is an expert in e-commerce and private international law matters. In the past 15 years, he has been holding senior positions at large international law firms and industrial companies with a focus on cross-border M&A deals and transaction structuring.  Vitaly graduated from the law faculty of Kuban State University, Russia, in 1999, and further obtained a postgraduate diploma (L.L.M) in International Banking and Commercial Law in 2001 from Queen Mary University in London.

BANNER.TEXT: Hurry up to buy tokens on the 1st day of sales with a 50 % bonus, limited quantity

MISSION.TEXT: The main mission of eGaaS is to create a common international platform for full implementation of an electronic government as a service, which would free citizens and businesses from routine bureaucratic procedures, provide a tool for organizing all activities and exercising control over them without documents circulation.

PEOPLES.TEXT1: Were employed in 2015 in the US alone in the field of accounting and auditing
PEOPLES.TEXT2: The rise in their number is projected in the coming years

FINANCE.TEXT2: Total revenue of the US banking sector formed from expenses of businesses and citizens on banking services in 2015
FINANCE.TEXT3: Business expenses on accounting services and preparation of tax documentation in the US by 2018 could reach
FINANCE.TEXT4: Turnover of the US shadow economy in 2012
FINANCE.TEXT5: Losses from unpaid taxes on wages in the shadow economy

BUTTONS.TEXT1: Transferring the activities of governments and legislative bodies to the eGaaS platform can save nearly  % of global GDP each year.

PLATFORM.HEAD: Platform for business and communities
PLATFORM.TEXT: eGaaS is technically a blockchain platform with the mechanism for creation and execution of smart contracts and smart laws. Therefore, even before the governments’ joining it, the platform can be successfully used to create a variety of financial, business and social applications, such as payment systems, stock exchanges, insurance and credit organizations, accounting and management systems in all fields, from commerce to medicine. eGaaS allows to create highly customizable applications with multiple functions implemented by smart contracts. Rules and conditions of smart contracts execution that are common for an application are recorded as smart laws. The eGaaS platform is a handy tool for the organization of the communities’ activities. It allows setting the rules of relations between their members and conduct voting. That is, even before the first States join eGaaS, the platform can be widely used in business and various spheres of social life.

LEFT.TEXT3: The first State transfers registry of citizens, legislation on civil status and electoral system to the eGaaS platform
LEFT.TEXT4: The first State opens an account in eGaaS in its national currency and translates the tax system and business law into smart laws
LEFT.TEXT5: Full transfer of the functioning of EU governments to the eGaaS platform
LEFT.TEXT6: The United States fully transfers to eGaaS
LEFT.TEXT8: 99 % of States in the world in eGaaS

RIGHT.TEXT2: Development of smart law and smart contract mechanisms
RIGHT.TEXT4: Release of the first version of the eGaaS application
RIGHT.TEXT7: Merging of v1.x and v0.x versions, which will enable to create states, communities, smart contracts/laws, etc. on a common eGaaS blockchain: Q1
RIGHT.TEXT8: A stable full-featured version of the eGaaS application: Q2
RIGHT.TEXT9: Launching of financial technology, insurance, registry, and other business and social applications on the eGaaS platform: Q3

MODEL.HEAD: Business model
MODEL.TEXT1: 1. The investor buys EGS tokens from eGaaS.
MODEL.TEXT2: 2. eGaaS develops and launches a blockchain platform using the proceeds.
MODEL.TEXT3: 3. eGaaS clients (governments, corporations, individuals) pay for transactions and the use of smart contracts and smart laws with the EGS tokens, buying them from investors.
MODEL.TEXT4: 4. eGaaS nodes sell EGS to maintenance and expansion of data centers.
MODEL.TEXT5: 5. 1 % of the clients’ payments for nodes's services goes to eGaaS development.

RELEASE.HEAD: EGS emission
RELEASE.TEXT: EGS tokens will be emitted only once, in an amount of 100 million.

DISTRIBUTION.HEAD: EGS distribution

PIE.TEXT1:
goes to investors (those that invested in the project before ICO), to the team and to future employees as motivational packages7,5% - investors who have invested up to ICO
22,5% - developers
5% - motivational packages

DISTRIBUTION.TEXT1: The need to conduct ICO in several rounds is to enhance transparency in the activities of the eGaaS team and increase the possibility of reporting to investors after each roadmap stage. To implement the next roadmap stage after ICO,  $500,000 investment is required. Therefore, during the first ICO round, 5,64 million EGS tokens will be sold.
DISTRIBUTION.TEXT2: We plan to sell the remaining 59.1 % during 2017-2019 in several rounds.

SALE.HEAD: Why is sale of our tokens in several rounds beneficial to investors?
SALE.TEXT1: Before each round, we show what we have done and report what the investment has been spent on
SALE.TEXT2: We will carry out the advertising campaign during each round, so the rate will grow on the stock exchange before the ICO
SALE.TEXT3: During each round, we will sell tokens at higher price than during the previous round

FIRST.HEAD: Why is it better to buy tokens in the first stage?
FIRST.TEXT: It must be kept in mind that restricting the sale of tokens in the first stage of the ICO at a fixed price, an advertising campaign before the second ICO, and start of eGaaS negotiations with several countries may lead to a sharp growth of the EGS rate on the exchanges by the second stage of the ICO, which will take place in 2017.

STAGES.HEAD: Sales in the first stage are divided into five periods with the following discounts:

STEPS.NOTE2: Bonus is added because of BTC's raise

STAGES.TEXT: * When the limit is reached, the system moves to the next sales stage with a new discount. Therefore, the ICO round can be completed ahead of schedule if the token limit is exhausted.

WHY.HEAD: Why buy EGS
WHY.TEXT1: EGS tokens ensure security of the eGaaS platform and working capacity of its nodes: opening of new tables, adding attributes, connecting and performing smart contracts and smart laws are paid for in EGS. Therefore, private and corporate users of the platform, as well as states will have to buy EGS to secure the working capacity of their eGaaS projects. Hence, the need for EGS tokens will inevitably grow, which will increase their exchange rate because EGS will be emitted only once.
WHY.TEXT2: It is inevitable that obsolete forms of governance will die out, while governments will be transformed into e-services for citizens. Do not miss the chance to participate in this revolutionary project in the first stages of its development.

DONE.HEAD: What has been done to date?
DONE.TEXT1: We’ve created two versions of the eGaaS application:
DONE.TEXT2: stable; for EGS tokens; available both in Lite version and in node control mode; the light version is also available for IOS and Android
DONE.TEXT3: unstable and so is powered by private blockchains; it can be used on your PC or local network; it allows to create eGaaS nodes, etc.
DONE.TEXT4: In v 0.x, through creation of new and modification of existing tables, pages, menus, and smart contracts of eGaaS, you can configure a state or community to suit your taste.
DONE.TEXT5: In the near future, we will add embedded applications (sets of smart contracts, smart laws, tables, pages, menus) in the 0.x version after which it will be possible to – in a few clicks – create interstate unions, monetary unions, central banks, registries, stock exchanges and so forth.
DONE.TEXT6: In the future, the 0.x and 1.x versions will be merged after which v 1.x will have all the features of version 0.x – instead of private blockchains there will be a common blockchain. All the countries and communities will be able to interact with each other, and will use EGS tokens for network protection.

FUNDS.HEAD: Distribution of ICO funds
FUNDS.TEXT: Main expenditure items of ICO funds

PIE.TEXT1: Finalization of the current version and writing from scratch of a new eGaaS stable version
PIE.TEXT3: Negotiating with States, creating international groups to agree on the rules and regulations by which States could join the platform
PIE.TEXT4: Payments to investors who financed eGaaS before the ICO
